title: 1 On 1 Hockey
script:
<\/script>function gtag(){dataLayer.push(arguments)}window.dataLayer=window.dataLayer||[],gtag("js",new Date),gtag("config","G-MENBM6GSNY")<\/script>
<\/script>

window.RufflePlayer = window.RufflePlayer || {};
window.RufflePlayer.config = {
"autoplay": "off",
"polyfills": true,
"letterbox": "on",
"backgroundColor": null,
"scale": "showAll",
"allowFullscreen": true,
"forceScale": true,
"forceAlign": true,
"splashScreen": true,
"wmode": "Window",
"unmuteOverlay": "hidden",
"quality": "high" };
window.addEventListener("load", (event) => {
const ruffle = window.RufflePlayer.newest();
const player = ruffle.createPlayer();
const container = document.getElementById("container");
container.appendChild(player);
player.load("https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/NWylynko/potatos@7ca279435083c6d51ad912731736f8a51440ec1c/swf/one-on-one-hockey.swf");
player.style.width = "100%";
player.style.height = "100%";
});
<\/script>



<\/script>
